data.englishTranslation: Do not worry, it will be a purification (for you), Allah willing.
data.arabicVerse: لاَ بَأْسَ طَهُورٌ إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ

data.englishTranslation: I ask Almighty Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne, to make you well. (Seven times)
data.arabicVerse: أَسْأَلُ اللَّهَ الْعَظِيمَ، رَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ أَنْ يَشْفِيَكَ
